CustomField.description: Field to concatenate the 2 Safety member continent fields for the purpose of email template addressing
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( Safety_Member_Continent__c ),(IF(ISBLANK( Safety_Member_Continent_2__c ),"", Safety_Member_Continent_2__r.FirstName & " " & Safety_Member_Continent_2__r.LastName )),(IF(ISBLANK( Safety_Member_Continent_2__c ), Safety_Member_Continent__r.FirstName & " " & Safety_Member_Continent__r.LastName, Safety_Member_Continent__r.FirstName & " " & Safety_Member_Continent__r.LastName &" / "& Safety_Member_Continent_2__r.FirstName & " " & Safety_Member_Continent_2__r.LastName )))
CustomField.label: Safety Member Formula
